content: this stuffable space saving travel pillow is the perfect thing for the person in your life that consistently overpacks follow this crochet pattern to make a flat travel pillow that you can stuff using some of your clothing to open up more space in your luggage for the trip home ✈️ for this pillow you will need approx 410 yards of worsted weight cotton yarn and a g/4mm crochet hook let s make one
